text: Melissa Barrera (born July 4, 1990) is a Mexican actress and singer. Her career began with roles in the telenovelas Siempre tuya Acapulco (2013), Tanto amor (2015), Club de Cuervos (2017), In the heights (2021), Scream (2022) and sequel Scream VI (2023). ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Singers from Monterrey Category:Actors from Monterrey
title: Melissa Barrera
